title: Talguu
description: A video streaming and selling web based system. I worked as a lead software engineer and designed the system architecture. I utitlized multiple technologies to achieve proper functionality as well as to meet non-functional requirements. The system generates HLS videos to minimize bandwidth usage and integrated payment systems such as paypal, paymongo and authorizenet.

title: Scratch Off Bingo
description: A side project to convert a paper based scratch off ticket to app that allows users to recharge their balance and buy a virtual scratch off ticket.

title: Virtual Keno System
description: A full fledged virtual KENO system. I created everything from scratch from designing the user interface to architecting the system. The system has overall 6 components. I also wrote a thermal printer wrapper to communicate with a thermal printer directly. It has also a mobile application for scanning tickets for redemption. Company registration and user management is also included in the project.  It is meticulously designed and scalable.

title: Everything Addis
description: A fullstack e-commerce web application where admin can manage categories and products, accept and process orders and customers can add products to a cart, make an order and get notified by email about the status of their order. It is also integrated with telegram channel thus avoiding posting the product separately.

title: Online Tracking and Scheduling for City Bus
description: An online bus scheduling system that allows a bus provider company to generate schedules from previous data and allows commuters to track and search buses in real-time.

title: Dereja Clone
description: A clone of dereja.com. The project is still ongoing.

title: Corporate Ethiopia
description: A job listing web application built with django. Admin can manage companies and jobs and users can search, filter and view jobs.
